0.title: Radars and Missiles: recent updates
0.description: A little more details of a recent update with noticeable improvements in the radar mechanics, the IRST range, and flight parameters of missiles.

1.title: Squadron vehicles: Hunter F.58
1.description: The Swiss version of the iconic British Hawker Hunter jet fighter, melding air-to-air and air-to-surface missiles. The Hunter, versatile like never before, will be yours for free for squadron activity points!

2.title: New effects for aviation in the Sky Guardians update
2.description: A little sneak peek of the new visual and physical improvements in War Thunder aviation that will be introduced into the game with the upcoming Sky Guardians update!

0.title: Mobile Infantry Event
0.description: Soldiers! It’s time to participate in an open field testing of advanced modern infantry equipment in urban combat. Four exoskeleton variations for different combat specializations will be available for you: Assault, Sniper, ATGM Operator, and MANPADS Operator. You will also be able to use a preset of ground vehicles and helicopters.

1.title: Tank Football 2023
1.description: We’re excited to invite you to the War Thunder special tank football event! You will experience the reworked physics of tank to ball interactions, as well as new to the game goalie mechanics, which will allow you to earn mission points and progress up through goalkeeper achievements!

2.title: Pages of History (April)
2.description: For the whole month, you will have 8 tasks available to you one by one. Completion of each task will award you with a trophy containing a reward, while completing all tasks will award you with a unique in-game player icon.

0.title: War Thunder "Sky Guardians" - Changelog
0.description: The first units for the French naval tree, new and updated graphical effects and data structure optimization  along with ejection seats for selected modern jets. Amongst the 43 new as well as updated vehicle models, one can't help but mention the real behemoth - the Char2, the agile AH-6M "Little Bird" helicopter or the first French light cruiser; Duguay-Trouin!. In addition to all this, the winter version of the location "Seversk", a new location for fans of avionics - Pyrenees, and as always, many improvements and fixes! Let's welcome the "Sky Guardians" update!

1.title: Update 2.25.1.19
1.description: Sounds of tank guns have been corrected to be more realistic. In third person, attacks are more clean and powerful, while the end of the shot feels more natural. In first person pushback, the breech mechanism and falling of shell casings are now more pronounced.

2.title: Update 2.25.0.52
2.description: Rewards that require all rewards from the same trophy to be unlocked have been moved to a separate section in the description of Battle trophies.
